item.title: CaSRP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaSRP1 Gene Name: stress-related protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Constitutive expression of CaSRP1, a hot pepper small rubber particle protein homolog, resulted in fast growth and improved drought tolerance in transgenic Arabidopsis plants.

item.title: Cg1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GRMZM5G838324 Gene Symbol: Cg1 Gene Name: Corngrass1 Genome: B73_RefGen_v3 Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: Furthermore, a target of Cg1 is teosinte glume architecture1 (tga1)1, a gene known to have had a role in the domestication of maize from teosinte.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ERS1 Gene Name: ethylene response sensor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Transgenic Lotus japonicus with an Ethylene Receptor Gene Cm-ERS1/H70A Enhances Formation of Infection Threads and Nodule Primordia.

item.title: CmANR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmANR1 Gene Name: MADS-box TF Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified bric-a-brac, tramtrack and broad (BTB) and transcription adapter putative zinc finger (TAZ) domain protein CmBT1 as the interacting partner of CmANR1 through a yeast-two-hybrid (Y2H) screening library.

item.title: CmNRRa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmNRRa Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmNRRa, an orthologous gene of OsNRRa that regulates root growth in response to nutrient stress in rice, was identified from Chrysanthemum and its role in flowering time was studied.

item.title: CsAAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa4G470690 Gene Symbol: CsAAP2 Gene Name: Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsAAP2 knockout lines exhibited arrested development of root meristem, which then caused the delayed initiation of lateral root and the inhibition of root elongation.

item.title: GmEIL4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g274600 Gene Symbol: GmEIL4 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEIL4 enhances soybean (Glycine max) phosphorus efficiency by improving root system development.

item.title: GmERF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G123100 Gene Symbol: GmERF1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors GmERF1 and GmWRKY6 synergistically regulate low phosphorus tolerance in soybean.

item.title: GmEXPB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmEXPB2 Gene Name: β-expansin gene Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEXPB2, a Cell Wall β-Expansin, Affects Soybean Nodulation through Modifying Root Architecture and Promoting Nodule Formation and Development.

item.title: GmFTL2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmFTL2 Gene Name: Glycine max flowering locus T-like protein 2 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmFTL2 expression is regulated by developmental and tissue-specific clues and plays roles in seedling establishment and the development of microgametophytes, embryos, and roots.

item.title: GmMAX2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmMAX2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmMAX2a restored atmax2 root hair defects and soybean root hairs were changed in GmMAX2a overexpression (GmMAX2a-OE) or knockdown (GmMAX2a-KD) mutants.

item.title: GmNMH7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmNMH7 Gene Name: Nodule MADS-box Homologue 7 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: In situ expression of the GmNMH7 gene is photoperiod-dependent in a unique soybean (Glycine max [L.

item.title: GmRR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09g040000 Gene Symbol: GmRR1 Gene Name: a soybean type-B Response Regulator 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Soybean type-B response regulator GmRR1 mediates phosphorus uptake and yield by modifying root architecture.

item.title: GmSAMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g054200 Gene Symbol: GmSAMT1 Gene Name: salicylic acid methyl transferase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A SAMT gene from soybean (GmSAMT1) plays a role in soybean defence against soybean cyst nematode (Heterodera glycines Ichinohe, SCN).

item.title: GmYUC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g038600 Gene Symbol: GmYUC2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYUC2a mediates auxin biosynthesis during root development and nodulation in soybean.

item.title: GmYUC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g038600 Gene Symbol: GmYUC2a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We analyzed the YUCCA (YUC) gene family of soybean and identified GmYUC2a as an important regulator of auxin biosynthesis that modulates nodulation.

item.title: HvCslF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU2Hr1G042350 Gene Symbol: HvCslF3 Gene Name: cellulose synthase-like F3 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The cellulose synthase-like F3 (HvCslF3) gene mediates cell wall polysaccharide synthesis and affects root growth and differentiation in barley.

item.title: IbEXP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbEXP1 Gene Name: expansin gene Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: The expressions of IbEXP1, IbEXP2 and IbEXPL1 were significantly correlated with the changes in cell wall component content, and were related to the qualitative structure changes.

item.title: MdARF17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdARF17 Gene Name: Auxin Response Factor 17 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Using stable transgenic plants, we found that drought tolerance was improved by higher levels of Mdm-miR160 or MdHYL1 and by decreased levels of MdARF17, whereas reductions in MdHYL1 or increases in MdARF17 led to greater drought sensitivity.

item.title: MdBPC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD16G1012800 Gene Symbol: MdBPC2 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdFLP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdFLP Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional regulation of MdPIN3 and MdPIN10 by MdFLP during apple self-rooted stock adventitious root gravitropism.

item.title: MdWOX4b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD08G1096300 Gene Symbol: MdWOX4b Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MeSCL33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.09G040200 Gene Symbol: MeSCL33 Gene Name: SC35-like splicing factor 33 Genome: high-quality genome sequence Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: RNA yeast 3-hybrid and RNA immunoprecipitation (RIP) assays showed that the serine/arginine-rich protein MeSCL33 (SC35-like splicing factor 33) binds to the precursor mRNA of MeABA1.

item.title: MtbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtbHLH1 Gene Name: basic helix loop helix 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtbHLH1, a bHLH transcription factor involved in Medicago truncatula nodule vascular patterning and nodule to plant metabolic exchanges.

item.title: MtCEP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MtrunA17_Chr8g0374821 Gene Symbol: MtCEP1 Gene Name: Medicago truncatula CEP1 Genome: Jemalong A17 Mt5.

item.title: MtERF1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtERF1-1 Gene Name: B-3 Ethylene Response Factor Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The B-3 Ethylene Response Factor MtERF1-1 Mediates Resistance to a Subset of Root Pathogens in Medicago truncatula without Adversely Affecting Symbiosis with Rhizobia.

item.title: MtMSBP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtMSBP1 Gene Name: steroid-binding protein 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Membrane steroid-binding protein 1 (MtMSBP1) induced by a diffusible fungal signal is critical for mycorrhization in Medicago truncatula Three of them were previously shown to be mycorrhiza induced at later stages of the symbiosis, while MtMSBP1, encoding a membrane-bound steroid-binding protein, is a novel mycorrhizal marker.

item.title: MtNOOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g090020.1 Gene Symbol: MtNOOT1 Gene Name: NODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The Medicago truncatula nodule identity gene MtNOOT1 is required for coordinated apical-basal development of the root.

item.title: MtNOOT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr7g090020 Gene Symbol: MtNOOT1 Gene Name: NODULE ROOT1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The Medicago truncatula nodule identity gene MtNOOT1 is required for coordinated apical-basal development of the root.

item.title: MtRac1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr6g087980 Gene Symbol: MtRac1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Here, we found that small GTPases (MtRac1/MtROP9 and its homologs) are required for root hair development and rhizobial infection in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: MtRbohE

item.title: MtZR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtZR1 Gene Name: PRAF family Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtZR1, a PRAF protein, is involved in the development of roots and symbiotic root nodules in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: PsGRP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsGRP1 Gene Name: putative glycine rich protein precursor Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Expression of PsGRP1, a novel glycine rich protein gene of Pisum sativum, is induced in developing fruit and seed and by ABA in pistil and root.

item.title: PtrXB38
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.010G070800.6 Gene Symbol: PtrXB38 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: Expression quantitative trait loci mapping identified PtrXB38 as a key hub gene in adventitious root development in Populus.

item.title: PuHox52
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuHox52 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: PuHox52 promotes coordinated uptake of nitrate, phosphate, and iron under nitrogen deficiency in Populus ussuriensis.

item.title: Sl-IAA27
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Sl-IAA27 Gene Name: Aux/IAA transcription factor27 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Phenotypes Associated with Down-Regulation of Sl-IAA27 Support Functional Diversity Among Aux/IAA Family Members in Tomato.

item.title: SlCCD8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCCD8 Gene Name: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE8 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE8 (SlCCD8) regulates rhizosphere signaling, plant architecture and affects reproductive development through strigolactone biosynthesis.

item.title: SlCyp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCyp1 Gene Name: low-temperature-induced cysteine proteinase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Here, we show that, in tomato, translocation of a phloem-mobile cyclophilin, SlCyp1, from a wild-type scion into a mutant rootstock results in restoration of vascular development and lateral root initiation.

item.title: SlFRK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlFRK3 Gene Name: fructokinase3 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato plastidic fructokinase SlFRK3 plays a role in xylem development.

item.title: Ta14S
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Ta14S Gene Name: 14-3-3 protein Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: It can be concluded that the high expression of all three Ta14S homoeologs in young roots may regulate initial elongation of the radical and affect root development.

item.title: TabHLH123
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TabHLH123 Gene Name: basic helix-loop-helix (bHLH) protein 123 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The wheat basic helix-loop-helix gene TabHLH123 positively modulates the formation of crown roots and is associated with plant height and 1000-grain weight under various conditions.

item.title: TaGSNE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5B02G257300.1 Gene Symbol: TaGSNE Gene Name: Grain Size and Number Enhancer Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaGSNE, a WRKY transcription factor, overcomes the trade-off between grain size and grain number in common wheat and is associated with root development.
